content: --अर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} having gained one's object, successful. {2} satisfied; happy, contented; कृतः कृतार्थोऽस्मि निबर्हितांहसा <ls>Śi. 1. 29</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 3</ls>; <ls>Ki. 4. 9</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 194.</ls> {3} clever. (कृतार्थीकृ {1} to render fruitful or successful. {2} to make good; कांतं प्रत्युपचारतश्चतुरया कोपः कृतार्थीकृतः <ls>Amaru. 15</ls>; so कृतार्थयति to make fruitful; <ls>Māl. 3. 6.</ls>).
